description.name: Snow Shovel "Family"
description.long_desc:
Snow Shovel "Family"


The shovel is made of high-quality plastic. Its custom-designed shape increases impact resistance.


The shovel is equipped with 2 rollers to facilitate moving and a steel bracket with a set of screws for assembly.


The edge of the shovel is covered with an aluminum stainless steel strip that protects the plastic from tearing.


- total length of the shovel is 134 cm
- width at the base is 78 cm
- the height of the plastic shovel is 39.5 cm

description.name: Metal Cutting Disc 400x4x32mm GEKO
description.long_desc:
Produced with high quality aluminium oxide grit. Fibreglass reinforced mesh. Discs are designed for fast cutting of structural steel components, sheet metal, pipes, profiles.


Product Features



  • Fibreglass reinforcement - extended wheel life

  • Suitable for cutting only, not grinding


Technical Data



  • Type: Metal Cutting Discs

  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Synthetic Resin

  • Diameter: 400 mm

  • Thickness: 4,0 mm

  • Hole Size: 32 mm

  • Speed [rpm]: 3800
description.short_desc:
Produced with high quality aluminium oxide grit. Fibreglass reinforced mesh. Discs are designed for fast cutting of structural steel components, sheet metal, pipes, profiles.

  • Abrasive Material: Aluminium Oxide

  • Abrasive Connection: Synthetic Resin

  • Diameter: 400 mm

  • Thickness: 4,0 mm

  • Hole Size: 32 mm

  • Speed [rpm]: 3800

description.name: Circular saw blade for wood 115x22x40T
description.long_desc:
GEKO high-quality steel Circular Saw Blade.


Product Features



  • Constructed with high-quality steel

  • Suitable for cutting oriented-strand board (OSB), medium-density fiberboard (MDF), plywood and plastics

  • Ideal for DIY projects and construction use


Technical Data



  • Type: Circular Saw Blade

  • Diameter: 115 mm

  • Hole Size: 22 mm

  • Number of Teeth: 40

description.name: TCT circular saw blade for wood 125x22x40T
description.long_desc:
Carbide-tipped wood cutting disc. To be used only with circular saws.


This wood cutting disc is made of high-quality steel. Designed for precise cutting of wood, chipboards, and carpentry. Ideally suited to professional carpentry and construction works.


Product features:



  • disc diameter - 125 mm

  • mounting hole - 22 mm

  • number of teeth - 40
